website_summaries.verdict: A non-greasy cream that's odorless and protective.
pros: Women love that this product is made with safe and natural ingredients
Many breastfeeding mothers report their babies did not have an aversion to it
It gets top marks for helping with soreness and irritation
cons: The consistency tends to be slightly grainy compared to similar products

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for new mothers with sensitivity issues.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver. I never expected pumping to hurt as badly as it did, even with proper latching and cool packs. The first few days of adjusting were hell but I know it would have been much worse without this product. The package seems small but a little goes a long way. I literally only need a pin sized amount for each nipple and I apply right before and after pumping. I have not tried it with direct breastfeeding so no comment on if the taste upsets my baby. I have had absolutely no cracking, soreness or pain since faithfully applying before and after a session. Yaaay! Will definitely continue use.
customer_reviews.author: mints

customer_reviews.title: Good, natural stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this nipple butter. Have only used this so can’t compare to anything else but it has worked to keep my nipples moist and not cracked, especially during those first 2 weeks. I like that it’s natural and you don’t have to worry about wiping off before baby eats.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great nipple cream!
customer_reviews.text: Love this nipple cream! I had the worst cracked nipples with my 1st attempt and breastfeeding and decided to use this while nursing my 2nd baby. My nipples were still so sore, but this was ultra soothing, moisturizing and safe for baby. There is no scent and just thick enough to not be goopy. I am still using this a few times a week 3 months later
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Melts quickly and stays put
customer_reviews.text: At room temperature this cream is thick, but not as tough to squeeze out as lanolin products. The amazing part is how quickly it melts in your fingers which makes it so easy to apply. In fact, it melts so quickly that I was worried it would be too greasy and get everywhere. Not at all! I've been using this for a few weeks now and can say it stays put, isn't greasy after a minute and doesn't stink. I've also been using it on my cuticles since they've been dry this winter and it works great on scars.
customer_reviews.author: TNTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review with a one week old, so you know it’s good! We left the hospital with the Medela brand lanolin, which worked fine for me, but my son would buck away from my breast and often make faces when latching. Since switching to Bella B, he latches right away. It has also been very soothing for me- no cracking or bleeding. It is quite thick and I haven’t experienced the “melting” described in other reviews, but it’s not anything I mind. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Erin EH

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I have ever written a bad review and I am a huge Amazon buyer. This stuff is horrible. The texture is kind of sandy. I brought it with me to the hospital and it was nasty. This is my third baby so I know good stuff vs this crap. Stick to motherlove. This was a total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do your nips a favor and buy this
customer_reviews.text: Please get this! I wish I would have purchased this when I first found it rather than letting it sit in my cart forever. As soon as I used this, my poor nips felt instantly soothed from nursing. It corrected the dryness and cracking like it was never an issue to begin with. It’s also a bonus that it’s natural. My babe is not bothered by it either and he’s sensitive to a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It also does a better job than any other product I have used at ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second nursling I have used this product with it. It's so convenient that you don't have to clean your nipple off before baby nurses...who really has time when baby is crying to eat?! It also does a better job than any other product I have used at keeping your nipple from drying out and cracking between feedings.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.M.

customer_reviews.title: I feel great using it and I like knowing that it's made ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this since I started BFing for the first time with my new baby and this works so greatt! I have nothing to compare it to but...I feel great using it and I like knowing that it's made with natural ingredients. Didn't use it one day b/c it got lost under the couch and noticed a difference the next morning. I haven't needed to try the lanolin that my friend gave me b/c i've been so happy with this product. Highly recommended. Great customer service too! If you're curious, it has a long shelf life so even if you don't go through it fast you can save it if you're planning on having other babies!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Instant Relief
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy and can be used before and after breastfeeding. Or can be used in between feedings if needed. I let it dry a little if I plan to use it before breastfeeding and baby doesn’t seem to mind the taste. I’ve used it with two children now and highly recommend it. I would suggest wearing it with a padded bra or an old shirt that you don’t care about as it will leave an oil like spot. I was able to get out after multiple washes. Worth the relief!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle worker! I had my daughter on a Wednesday and by Saturday my nipples were so sore with scabs already I was terrified of the next 12 months of breastfeeding. But as soon as I started using this my nipples began healing and feeling better immediately. Now you have to be consistent and use it everytime you finish feeding (I nursed using a guard during use. It protected my nipples from immediate contact with her gums) and the "boo-boo's" healed within a couple days, totally gone! I highly recommend! And it does not harm baby😊.
customer_reviews.author: Rlandis

customer_reviews.title: Feels and works great
customer_reviews.text: Would have gave it 5 stars but it is extremely thick in the tube. At first I thought maybe it was frozen from being in my mailbox (I ordered in the winter). After a day or two of leaving it out on the counter it was still so thick in the tube. I have a hard time squeezing it out, but the little bit I get out each time feels and works great, very soft to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Breastfeeding relief
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful to get through the first weeks of breastfeeding. Also good to have around during cluster feedings. It doesn’t make the pain completely go away, but it does take the edge off. Really reassuring that it’s safe for the baby to ingest.
customer_reviews.author: Mera Andersom

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT stain!
customer_reviews.text: This cream was really nice when I first needed it after my twins were born. It does not stain your clothes nor does it have a weird smell. You do have to squeeze hard to get it to come out as it is thick, but this is do to the coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Macdonell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: Wow I originally had this on my cart for when I have my baby in November, but with my older son having terrible dry lips plus a deep split on his lip I went ahead and ordered this. I have to say I just received it yesterday and already i have seen a huge improvement his lips stay more moisturized than anything else I ever tried. I can't wait to try this as nipple butter.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Miracle Cream
customer_reviews.text: this is the best nipple cream ever. Smells great, does not feel thick, works wonders on cracked / bleeding spots from breastfeeding. Legitimately feel better by the next feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Dare

customer_reviews.title: Go with polysporin instead
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an alternative to lanolin, this is a great product! However, you are better off using polysporin if you’re in pain/cut up from breastfeeding, as it will actually heal the wound and help you do what you need to do. This (and lanolin) is really just a cooling/lotion-like treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This product is more costly than the similar lanolin products available but I feel like the natural ingredients are worth the price difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Allen

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT product. I have used several things for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT product. I have used several things for my cracked and damaged breast during pumping exclusively for my child. This product is by far the best. I highly recommend, it's more moisturizing and lasts longer than straight coconut oil. It is not as greasy or yeast prone as other nipple butters. So glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: FIShopper

customer_reviews.title: Never got to use
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use it was completely solid mass inside the tube. But good amount for price has I been able to use it and I got my money back so 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: CMArmy wife

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The product is for sensitive nipples which I have but it didn't work for me. I wish I could return it and get my money back but in order for that to happen, I'd have to have not used it. I wouldn't have known it wouldn't work for me if I hadn't used it...
customer_reviews.author: Berna Balauro

customer_reviews.title: Best Nipple Cream on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great! Even Lactation consultant approved at our local hospital!! A small amount goes a long way. Do not need to wash off before feedings, but I put on right after a feeding. No cracks or dryness or bleeding! No irritation or greasy feeling. A very light scent that does not bother baby. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AKgoldfish

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer. Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I'm pregnant and use this as my nipples were so dry and flaky. Just 2 uses and everything was back to normal. I even use it on my stretch marks as a moisturizer. It does take a little bit of working the tube to warm up the lotion to get it to squeeze out if the tube but once you figure it out, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Lansinoh/lanolin
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my first-born because I wasn’t sure about using lanolin. I loved this product and continued to use it with my second baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come out of the tube!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful product!!! I used their tommy cream and it is the best. But this cream doesn’t even get out of the tube so I can try it!!! They might need to change the tube to a jar or sth!!! I need to return this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: lll

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for any nursing mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my baby was almost a month old. I had lanolin, which was good for protection in a shower, but it was so thick in general that it hurt to put it on after every nursing session. Enter this Nurture Butter. Ahhhh, it was immediately soothing. It was thinner than I expected, but as long as I shook the tube a few times, it was fine. A little went a long way, and I didn't mind my baby ingesting it. I only needed it for a couple of months and didn't use the full tube. Now I give this to friends as part of baby shower gifts.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift at my baby shower, and I love it! it has helped my sore nipples countless times! I had a friend that was pregnant, and I made sure to get her her own bottle of this! I will recommend this product to any new mom!
customer_reviews.author: R Pat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product...after a little patience
customer_reviews.text: At first I was annoyed And thought I was going to have to return this product because I could not get the cream to come out of the tube no matter how hard I squeezed. Then I stuck a sharp object into the Opening of the tube as if to break a suction and all of a sudden the cream came out with no issue. Now that it comes out it works great!
customer_reviews.author: getitdunn

customer_reviews.title: GOLD! buy it now...
customer_reviews.text: Stop reading...put it in your cart. This stuff is GOLD. I give it as a gift to every pregnant lady in my life. So helpful too that you don't have to worry about wiping it off before feeding your baby like you have to with other products. I also do a lot of pumping and this helps when they start to feel beat up and dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: You’ll bee obsessed with it 🐝
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle butter! As a first time mom I freaked when my skin started drying out... this is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Just like butter!
customer_reviews.text: Love the consistency of this. It definitely feels like butter and helps sooth cracked nipples. I breastfeed 95% of the day and pump maybe once or twice and this product relieves alot of pain that comes along with that routine. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary R

customer_reviews.title: Could not breastfeed and pump without it.
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by the nurse who taught our childbirth class. It has been a lifesaver. I apply it all over the area covered by the pump flange prior to pumping and it makes pumping a breeze. I apply a little extra on the nipples after pumping and between feedings, and I've had not cracking or bleeding problems at all so far. It's instantly soothing. My little guy has no apparent aversion to the taste or feel.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Best cream around, literally like butter
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different kinds and this one is the best one yet! Smooth and not oily. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing nipple butter. I am prone to dry skin, and this helps me stay soft without harm to my baby. The only reason I give it four stars is because of an error on the packaging. Mango is on the packaging, but not in the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: volleymom

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the way this smells, it’s not over powering, smells sweet, and not too greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Riette

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product. I started using this at the hospital after my son was born. I would apply before and after nursing. I have yet to have any issues with dry/cracked nipples. This product comes out almost grainy but melts when applying. It’s a great texture and consistency. Feels much less oily compared to other brands. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for dry itchy nipples
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different nursing creams and this is my favorite. I will be reordering! I love that I don't have to constantly reapply
customer_reviews.author: PandaMom

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: This is moisturizing but it didn’t help with the pain as much as other creams have
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - too thick and unusable
customer_reviews.text: This product is AWFUL. I can barely squeeze it out of the tube using all my strength (same with my husband). I’m not sure why this is happening. I know it’s suoposed to be thick, but it’s unusable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brett B.

customer_reviews.title: I haven’t really tried any other creams but this one works great.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t really tried any other creams but this one works great
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S.

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family member who needed it. Feedback is that it is a very nice product & she’s happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: Wife thanks you lol
customer_reviews.text: Wife said it helps baby doesnt seem to care about it being on either.
customer_reviews.author: Joh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing nipple cream
customer_reviews.text: Amazing nipple cream. It was recommended to me by a friend and I love it. It has a good texture and soaks into nipple. Only thing that relieved my dry, sore, cracked nipples after new baby learning to latch. And even later when she started biting. This relieved the pain. I use it if they ever feel dry as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff.. It is easy to apply since it’s not super thick like lanolin... and it does relieve soreness and dryness discomfort from improper latch and breastfeeding.. Honestly I don’t think I would have made it this far with breastfeeding if it wasn’t for this and the wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy
customer_reviews.text: Thick at first but quickly melts to a more manageable consistency
customer_reviews.author: Miah C.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works wonders! I just started breastfeeding and ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works wonders! I just started breastfeeding and I put a tiny bit on before and after each feeding. My daughter doesn't mind it at all! I have had a little bit of dryness, but that's only when I forget to use this. Once I apply it, I notice the chapped feeling goes away within minutes. I plan on ordering more just to have back up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful... eases the pain after first days of breastfeeding.. love that its organic. My baby didnt seem to be bothered by it
customer_reviews.author: Dallana

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend. Delivery was in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great Boobie cream
customer_reviews.text: Great boobie butter! So soft and does well while maintaining its softness.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen&Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The BEST nipple cream!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! I tried so many different creams to help with the dry cracked nipples and this was the only cream that actually worked! It goes on so smooth and doesn’t leave a greasy stain on your clothes. So worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Knoch

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A nurse recommend it to me and I love it! Actually, I'll need to order more soon
customer_reviews.author: JennyRW

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The product does a great job of moisturizing. However it is oil based so it will leave residue on shirts or bras while it is still soaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for first time breastfeeding moms
customer_reviews.text: This was my lifesaver for being a first time mom breastfeeding only. The cream gives relief and melts on like butter which was nice to ease the dreadful pain of nursing and waiting for lactation to come in. Which by the way I had no idea it took about three days to come in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that it not in a jar
customer_reviews.text: Squeeze out a tube is very convenient when hands are full
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, like it better than mother love nipple cream. Also like the snap on lid.
customer_reviews.author: Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream! It’s natural and doesn’t stain. The beat cream ever! Suggested this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Hil B

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommended
customer_reviews.text: When breastfeeding I used this religiously for my nipples to help with the cracking. Baby is able to taste it... I had to wipe my nipple in order to latch my baby. Started seeing improvement right away.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Run!!
customer_reviews.text: This does not help at all. My nipples cracked, bleed, blistered. This did not even help with the pain after it did not help with the conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to all breastfeeding mothers. I had an allergy to the Lansinoh, and this product is lanolin free which avoids those issues. It also is not as greasy as the lanolin based products. Another plus is that it actually washes off in the shower. This allows you to have some time to "dry out" after your shower. Having some "dry" time helps keep the bacterial growth down.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R

customer_reviews.title: Wife's Review: She LOVED this
customer_reviews.text: Per my wife's review, She loved this so much better than Lansinoh. It melts with your skin and is very gentle.
customer_reviews.author: James F

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness this is a life saver. I have tried two different cream and this one is by far the best. I noticed when I switched over to the different one. I can’t live to hour this cream. Thank you for whoever invented this. Best cream ever.
customer_reviews.author: kripa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the best nipple cream I've ever used. Never buying a different product again
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Shahlamian

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and works so much better than the standard nipple cream. If it is gritty when you get it, it's okay. I had called the company and they told me it was fine said I could still use it and they also sent me another just because. What a great company.
customer_reviews.author: The Beene's

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get this to come out of the tube, I squeeze it and nothing... so irritated.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A little does a lot
customer_reviews.text: I got this about a week ago and have been using it ever since. My breasts have been "practicing" for a while now and sometimes get sore or chapped. You only have to use a drop or two of this product at a time so I see it lasting for a looooong loooong time. It was very soothing and relieved chapping within 2 nights.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Momma

customer_reviews.title: Average nipple butter
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 different types of nipple creams that I've been using and this one is average. I do like the smell and it doesn't seem to stain too much. however, it doesn't seem to absorb completely and is a bit greasy. I must admit that my favorite is lansinoh, even though I prefer using all organic products. Earth mama's nipple butter is second best.
customer_reviews.author: ART

customer_reviews.title: Great for chapped, cracked nipples due to breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in place of a lanolin. It provides great relief for chapped, cracked nipples from breastfeeding. The only complaint was that it's slightly gritty when you first touch it, but you don't notice that once it is applied. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is the nipple cream you want
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I came across this product. There is no smell, no residue, just relief from sore nipples! It was unavailable for a few weeks on amazon and I was heartbroken. Wow I'm so happy it's back - I got a few extra on my last order just in case. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: buy earth momma angel baby nipple balm instead!
customer_reviews.text: It's better than the lanolin ones, but doesn't even begin to compare to earth momma angel baby nipple balm. Skip this and buy earth momma, you won't be disappointed. This stuff doesn't really penetrate to sooth, it just cakes on and sits there.
customer_reviews.author: Tales of a Boy Mom

customer_reviews.title: overall, a good product
customer_reviews.text: When I started breastfeeding and it was difficult and painful I purchased a variety of products to make the process easier. If you're wanting to avoid an animal product like lanolin, I'd recommend this product. How someone thought of putting something derived from sheep's wool on a sore breast is beyond me. This along with the cold cabbage leaf treatment proved to be effective and it made my life much easier, painless, and it helped me to do what was best for my child and that is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: slapapug

customer_reviews.title: Great consistency, very moisturizing and glides on easily
customer_reviews.text: Could not survive without this cream. Great consistency, very moisturizing and glides on easily. Used Lansinoh cream previously and I didn't like the sticky texture. This cream works better than any others I have tried to soothe cracked, irritated nipples.
customer_reviews.author: Junipe777

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite and literally saved me during those first few weeks of nursing. We buy this often and actually my husband uses it as well for his hands. He says its the only thing that helps his rough hands to heal. highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best. It's the only nipple butter I've found with ALL plant-based ingredients, and I feel good putting it on, knowing my son may nurse again at any time. It has helped me heal through some tough times! I give it as a gift to many of my new mama friends!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome nipple cream!
customer_reviews.text: I love this nipple cream, it's more moisturizing than the other products I also bought. I even use this on my lips as lip balm too. Great product that I will be repeat buying for sure.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been a mom for a little less than three weeks and I haven't had much in the way of chafing, but the few times I did experience nipple irritation this balm helped a lot. I've used it on my lips (they were so dry after leaving the hospital) and I think it aided in their healing. Overall, I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: forever orange

customer_reviews.title: Way better than lanolin
customer_reviews.text: After delivering my son, I was given sample packets of Medela lanolin at the hospital to help with sore nipples. I used it, wasn't a huge fan, but didn't really know what else to use. I searched on Amazon, read lots of reviews, and decided on Nipple Nurture. SO glad I did! This stuff is way better than Medela's lanolin - goes on nicer, feels smoother and feels much more nourishing to my nips! Great product, will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy176

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the consistency.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the consistency of this product. It was very grainy and not smooth at all. I will not buy again. If does for job but there's others out there that do the same and are smooth not grainy
customer_reviews.author: Dmi2015

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Very effective and easy to apply. It washes off your hands easily unlike some other lanolin ointments that leave a residue.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny D

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Always did love this product when I had my daughter, now I'm using it with my son. Seller even contacted me to make sure I received the item. :)
customer_reviews.author: Angel B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this feels better than the Lansinoh.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Silky and very helpful
customer_reviews.text: The product is a little hard to get out of the bottle but when you do it's great. Feels almost like Vaseline. Very smooth and has helped with soreness.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Covello

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew this product existed with my 1st baby. The little "Scrubs" in this nipple butter is what I think work to relieve any kind of soreness. LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but hard to squeeze out of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Nipple Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nipple cream I’ve purchased. It’s less messy and greasy than the others I’ve tried and it stays on longer. Definitely worth the $10. Will be buying this to give as a gift for baby showers in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and does not have a gross smell like lanolin, my baby has not problem latch while this is on
customer_reviews.author: Ducks_mom

customer_reviews.title: This will save you during those first few weeks of nursing!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best nipple butter I’ve used! I highly recommend this for those first few weeks of nursing!
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Used this product all the time throughout my breastfeeding experience. Loved it very soothing
customer_reviews.author: nancy singletary

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy - works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is creamy and doesn't again my clothes or the inside of my bras. Not greasy at all and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniferyan

customer_reviews.title: Really hard to squeeze out of the tube!! ...
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to squeeze out of the tube!! Once it's out, it's lovely, but it's a real chore to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has everything that I was looking for.My lactation consultant recommended to use a little nipple butter right before pumping and it helped especially in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: pittiSA

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Wish the tube was bigger. This fixes my cracked and sore nipples over night.
customer_reviews.author: Kameron Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use both the lanolin butter and this product. The other is great before you get in the shower for protecting new mommy nipples! But this product is just the right texture for applications throughout the day! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: HappyLife

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work so well for me--but smelled nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really think you have to try lots of different products and see what works for you. This one was grainy and just didn't give me a whole lot of relief. The stuff that worked for me was the Medela Tender Care and MotherLove. That said, to each her own! This might work great on someone else.
customer_reviews.author: t. lily

customer_reviews.title: Great while breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: Used more than a year and found great while breastfeeding. It is very helpful if u have sore nipples.
customer_reviews.author: Suganya Natarajan

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Wife used this during her first pregnancy and it worked overall pretty well. The smell isn't fantastic but it's not bad either. I would suggest doing research and seeing what works for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: great addition to lanolin
customer_reviews.text: This cream is great, i needed the lanolin at first, but this cream is great for later use and is better to keep in the baby bag because it is not as greasy as lanolin and doesn't stick to your hands like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It feels soothing. It's texture is smooth & it feels like it melts on like butter. It doesn't hurt to apply on unlike Lanisoh (hard , sticky texture hurts when applied on).
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good consistency and works just as well as traditional Lanolin products.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Moorman

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: GAME CHANGER!! I have tried a few different creams & this one is by far the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My pregnant wife enjoys using it! She loves it, so 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Darth Nihilus

product_meta.title: Bella B Nurturing Nipple Butter 2 oz - Organic Nipple Cream For Breastfeeding - Natural Nipplecreams For Breastfeeding - Breastfeeding Nipple Cream - Nipple Cream For Breastfeeding Organic
product_meta.description:
Size:2 OunceFree of petroleum, lanolin (comes from sheep's wool), and parabens (artificial preservatives), Nipple Nurture Butter uses plant based ingredients that are food-grade and 100% safe for mom and baby. We've chosen the very best natural ingredients including cocoa, shea and mango butter that are combined to provide excellent soothing and healing properties, without using animal by-products. Use before and after breastfeeding to help prevent and soothe sore or cracked nipples.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Nipple Nurture Butter is the perfect lanolin-free alternative to other breastfeeding creams. It is an excellent alternative for mothers that would prefer a plant-based alternative to lanolin. This cream includes cocoa, shea and mango butter that are combined and specially-blended to provide excellent soothing, healing properties without using animal by-products. Nipple Nurture Butter is free of parabens.
feature_bullets: NIPPLE GUARD: Use before and after breastfeeding to help prevent and soothe sore or cracked nipples.
LANOLIN-FREE BREASTFEEDING CREAM: The perfect lanolin-free alternative for breastfeeding mammas.
ORGANIC NIPPLE BUTTER: Contains natural ingredients including cocoa, shea and mango butter.
BABY SAFE: Hypoallergenic and paraben, lanolin and petroleum-free for a baby safe nursing cream.
FOOD GRADE INGREDIENTS: Our nipple balm for breastfeeding contains only plant-based ingredients.
